# Generated by chatGPT

What is the first Pokémon in the Pokédex?
Pikachu, Bulbasaur, Charmander, Squirtle
Bulbasaur

Which Pokémon is known as the 'Symbol of Peace' in the Pokémon world?
Pikachu, Eevee, Mewtwo, Lugia
Lugia

Which Pokémon is known for its transformation ability?
Jigglypuff, Ditto, Psyduck, Geodude
Ditto

What type of Pokémon is Pikachu?
Water, Electric, Fire, Grass
Electric

What is the evolved form of Bulbasaur?
Ivysaur, Venusaur, Charizard, Blastoise
Ivysaur

Which Pokémon is known as the 'Balloon Pokémon'?
Jigglypuff, Wigglytuff, Clefairy, Clefable
Jigglypuff

Which Pokémon is not a legendary Pokémon?
Mew, Mewtwo, Pikachu, Articuno
Pikachu

What is the name of the professor who gives Ash his first Pokémon?
Professor Oak, Professor Elm, Professor Birch, Professor Sycamore
Professor Oak

Which Pokémon is known as the 'Flame Pokémon'?
Charmander, Squirtle, Bulbasaur, Pikachu
Charmander

Which Pokémon is known for its singing ability?
Jigglypuff, Pikachu, Charmander, Squirtle
Jigglypuff

Which Pokémon is known as the 'Seed Pokémon'?
Bulbasaur, Ivysaur, Venusaur, Charmander
Bulbasaur

What is the evolved form of Squirtle?
Wartortle, Blastoise, Charizard, Venusaur
Wartortle

Which Pokémon is known as the 'Mouse Pokémon'?
Pikachu, Raichu, Pichu, Rattata
Pikachu

Which Pokémon is not a Psychic type Pokémon?
Mew, Mewtwo, Alakazam, Gyarados
Gyarados

What is the name of the villainous team in the original Pokémon games?
Team Rocket, Team Magma, Team Aqua, Team Galactic
Team Rocket

Which Pokémon is known as the 'Electric Mouse Pokémon'?
Pikachu, Raichu, Pichu, Rattata
Pikachu

Which Pokémon is known for its sleeping ability?
Jigglypuff, Pikachu, Charmander, Snorlax
Snorlax

What type of Pokémon is Charizard?
Fire/Flying, Fire/Dragon, Fire/Ground, Fire/Fighting
Fire/Flying
